overview: Secretly Canadian presents Farewell Transmission - an archival time capsule to celebrate the life and music of singer/ songwriter Jason Molina, spanning the years 1997-2017. Farewell Transmission welcomes viewers to dive into a cinema collage including Secretly Canadian video files, fan recordings, and unearthings from dark corners of the internet, to remember and rejoice in all the incarnations of Jason's beloved career including: Songs: Ohia, Magnolia Electric Co. as well as his solo work.
title: Jason Molina - Farewell Transmission
